## pix2tobii { #pix2tobii }

`pix2tobii(win, p)`

Convert PsychoPy pixel coordinates to Tobii ADCS coordinates.

### Parameters

| Name   | Type                   | Description                                                          | Default   |
|--------|------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| `win`  | psychopy.visual.Window | The PsychoPy window which provides information about units and size. | required  |
| `p`    | tuple                  | The PsychoPy pixel coordinates to convert.                           | required  |

### Returns

| Type   | Description                           |
|--------|---------------------------------------|
| tuple  | The converted Tobii ADCS coordinates. |

### Notes

The conversion is done by dividing the pixel coordinates by the window size
and adding 0.5 to the x and y coordinates to center the origin at the
middle of the screen.
